lyrics:
38 contributorstranslationsitalianobahasa indonesiaonce in a lifetime lyricsverse 1 liam
once in a lifetime its just right
we make no mistakes
not even a landslide or riptide
could take it all away

prechorus harry
somehow it feels like nothing has changed
right now my heart is beating the same
out loud someones calling my name
it sounds like you

chorus all
when i close my eyes
all the stars align
and you are by my side
you are by my side

verse 2 louis niall
once in a lifetime its just right
and we are always safe
not even the bad guys in the dark night
could take it all away

prechorus all louis niall
ooh somehow it feels like nothing has changed
right now my heart is beating the same
ooh out loud someones calling my name
and it sounds like you
you might also likechorus all
when i close my eyes
all the stars align
and you are by my side
you are by my side

bridge zayn all
you are by my side
you are by my side
you are by my side

outro liam
once in a lifetime you were mine35embed
